subject: Simsonn pro x ultra
description_text:
Hi

Regards

Leroy Gordon

conversations.body_text: Hi Leroy Gordon,  We sincerely apologize for the oversight during packaging. Could you temporarily use an M6 nut as a replacement? If that’s not feasible, we can send you a replacement, although it may take some time as the part is very small.

Hi thanks for you response.

I am trying alternatives but it don't seem to work at the moment.

I understand it will take time for a replacement but I think that is
the best solution unless I can pick something up like that locally. Gonna
be hard to find something that works tho.

Regards

Leroy Gordon
